name: The Six-Sided Situation
description:
The Six-Sided Situation is a puzzle game about being a dice, with all the challenges of trying to maneuver around as a cube.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move.

R to restart the level.

Backspace to return to the menu.

B to full screen.

The Six-Sided-Situation was made for the 2022 GMTK GameJam.
